abstract: A new agency, Sparks and Honey, seeks to identify trends in pop culture and create content for brands that take advantage of those trends.
snippet: A new agency, Sparks and Honey, seeks to identify trends in pop culture and create content for brands that take advantage of those trends.
lead_paragraph: MARKETERS have long tried to track trends among consumers and then race to capitalize on them. At the turn of the last century, Lillian Russell appeared in advertising for Coca-Cola. The craze for the cowboy character Hopalong Cassidy at the dawn of the television era generated licensed merchandise like lunch boxes and roller skates. And most recently, countless basketball fans went wild for Jeremy Lin.

headline.main: Spotting the Trends, Before They Break Out
headline.print_headline: Spotting the Trends, Before They Break Out
